metadata.title: CVE-2019-18860 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Squid before 4.9, when certain web browsers are used, mishandles HTML inthe host (aka hostname) parameter to cachemgr.cgi.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
squid-cgi - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
squid-common - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
squid-purge - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
squid3 - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
squidclient - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.27-1ubuntu1.6').
